definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Specifically, luminosity is proportional to radius squared.
sentences.chinese: 具體來說，光度與半徑的平方呈正比。

sentences.english: And, that radius rotates around the wheel as the wheel is moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 這條半徑隨着車輪的向前移動在旋轉着。

sentences.english: Pin connected main frame, short turning radius, flexible mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 鉸接式車架，轉彎半徑小，機動靈活。

sentences.english: We can compute the circular area with radius.
sentences.chinese: 我們能用半徑計算出圓的面積。

sentences.english: The radius of curvature of road should be considered while making plant design of the road.
sentences.chinese: 道路邊的植物種植，應考慮道路的曲率半徑。

sentences.english: Poison Sense. Sense poison in 30-ft. radius .
All the variations are associated with the charges and atomic radiuses of metals.
sentences.chinese: 這些變化均與金屬離子所帶電荷和原子半徑有關。

sentences.english: E-field distribution are similar on spheres at different radius. (4).
sentences.chinese: 電流陣列在不同半徑場球面上之電場分佈相同。

sentences.english: The expression of the long-term optical-beam spreading radius is obtained by a quadratic approximation.
sentences.chinese: 通過二次方近似得到了長期光束擴展半徑表達式。

sentences.english: The final step for this article is to upgrade it to have a radius control.
sentences.chinese: 本文的最後一步是將其升級爲具有半徑控制的功能。

sentences.english: The above metioned phenomena are attributed to ionic radii and the electron work functions values of the differently doped ions.
sentences.chinese: 離子半徑和各離子的功函數可以解釋這種現象。

sentences.english: This is ionic radii with a noble gas configuration.
sentences.chinese: 這是稀有氣體的離子半徑。

sentences.english: There is the Bohr radius down there, number 24.
The military said he was snatched from outside the base perimeter along with three Afghan nationals.
sentences.chinese: 軍方稱他是在基地防衛半徑之外被三名阿富汗人綁走。

sentences.english: For two years, hedocumented the addicts he encountered in a single, half-mile radius ofthe city.
sentences.chinese: 兩年來，他記錄了城中僅半英里半徑內遇到的癮君子。

sentences.english: The melting temperatures and heats of fusion decrease approximately linearly with the reciprocals of cluster radii.
sentences.chinese: 團簇的熔點和熔化焓與團簇半徑的倒數呈線性關係。

definition: area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
